title: God in Your Gums, Part 2
description:
If the Lord is so willing to give us direction, why do we often feel so lost?  And if heâ€™s giving us words to say, why don't we speak up? Dr. Tony Evans will have the answers in this lesson as he talks about the importance of letting the Holy Spirit speak and live through us.
